::: {.question} **Arithmetic vs. Geometric Average Return** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(303) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false library(webexercises) r1 <- rnorm(1, mean = 8, sd = 3) r2 <- rnorm(1, mean = 12, sd = 4) arith_mean <- (r1 + r2) / 2 geo_mean <- ((1 + r1/100) * (1 + r2/100))^(1/2) - 1 ``` ::: A stock yielded returns of **6.51%** and **13.12%** over two consecutive years. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Arithmetic average return = (r1 + r2)/2 = **9.81**%.
::: ::: {.question-block}
✅ Geometric average return = [(1 + r1/100) × (1 + r2/100)]¹ᐟ² − 1 = **9.76**%.
::: :::
